input.sentences: i attended the parade with my son today .
the star wars characters eventually showed up .
a whole host of superheroes were marching along .
a lot of people ended up dressing up .
output.sentences: My son and I went to the parade the other day.
We saw men dressed up like Spider Man and Jack Sparrow.
Eventually, we finally got to see his favorite Star Wars character, Chewbacca.
The host of the parade was marching with the super heroes.
Many other people were in the parade, dressed in all kinds of crazy outfits.
